pages.text: 86|1|Sapatha asamanera ebam rate ya abirbhuta haya tara
86|2|ara kise apanake janabe â€˜rate ya abirbhuta hayaâ€™ ta ki
86|3|ujjbala naksatra [1].
86|4|Pratyeka jibera upara'i tattbabadhayaka rayeche [1].
86|5|Ata'eba, manusa yena cinta kare dekhe take ki theke srsti kara hayeche [1]
86|6|take srsti kara hayeche sabege sthalita pani hate [1]
86|7|eta nirgata haya merudanda o panjarasthira madhya theke [1].
86|8|Niscaya tini take phiriye anate saksama [1].
86|9|Yedina gopana bisaya pariksita habe [1]
86|10|sedina tara kono samarthya thakabe na ebam sahayyakari'o naya.
86|11|Sapatha asamanera, ya dharana kare brsti [1]
86|12|ebam sapatha yaminera, ya bidirna haya [1]
86|13|niscaya ala-kura'ana mimansakari bani.
86|14|Ebam eta nirarthaka naya [1].
86|15|Tara bhisana sarayantra kare [1]
86|16|ebam ami'o bhisana kausala kari [1].
86|17|Ata'eba, kaphiraderake abakasa dina; taderake abakasa dina kichu kalera jan'ya [1].
87|1|Apani apanara sumahana rabera namera pabitrata o mahima ghosana karuna [1]
87|2|yini [1] srsti karena [2] atahpara suthama karena [3].
87|3|Ara yini nirdharana karena [1] atahpara pathanirdesa karena [2]
87|4|ara yini trnadi utpanna karena [1]
87|5|pare ta dhusara abarjanaya parinata karena.
87|6|Sighra'i amara apanake patha karaba, phale apani bhulabena na [1]
87|7|allah ya icche karena ta chara [1]. Niscaya tini janena ya prakasya o ya gopaniya.
87|8|Ara amara apanara jan'ya sugama kare deba sahaja patha [1].
87|9|Atahpara upadesa yadi phalaprasu haya tabe upadesa dina [1]
87|10|ye bhaya kare se'i upadesa grahana karabe [1].
87|11|Ara ta upeksa karabe ye nitanta hatabhagya
87|12|ye bhayabaha agune dagdha habe
87|13|tarapara sekhane se marabe'o na bamcabe'o na [1].
87|14|Abasya'i saphalya labha karabe ye parisud'dha haya [1].
87|15|Ebam tara rabera nama smarana kare o salata kayema kare [1].
